casebody.data:
LILLIE
v.
BALL. No. 421P10-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2015. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert Alan Lillie, for Lillie, Robert Alan. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2015 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2015."
